revised_title: Regge Poles in Non-Radial Oscillations of Stars
tldr: This article demonstrates how Regge's theory of potential scattering can be applied to non-radial oscillations of stars in general relativity. The authors show how the theory can be used to analyze the resonant scattering of both axial and polar gravitational waves, providing a deeper understanding of the flow of energy through a star during oscillations.
